研究区域.地名: Wenchuan County,Sichuan,China;Longmen Shan fault,China;Sichuan basin,China;Tibetan plateau,China

数据来源.来源: China Earthquake Administration regional broadband seismic network

研究方法: causal & acausal delay-time comparison to exclude clock errors

研究结论.地壳速度变化: 0.4 % group-velocity decrease in an ~250 km × 50 km zone NW of the Longmen Shan fault at 10-25 km depth
研究结论.主要机制: coseismic stress drop (~3 MPa) increases fracture density, reducing seismic velocity
研究结论.次要机制: minor shallow damage (<1 km) contributes <0.05 % velocity change and is negligible

结论的不确定性.讨论: spatial resolution limited by station geometry; 50-day postseismic stacking may underestimate full coseismic drop due to early healing; source distribution heterogeneity ruled out by causal-acausal symmetry check
